page.title: 16Children's Games.
page.content: { Tie and Seek}is a game that can be played at school and elsewhere.The idea is to get some ropes and tie one person very tight.You then run off and hide. The person who is 'on' has to then untie themselves and go and find the rest of the players. There should be three or more. {Kingsley.}The rules of this game are as follows...You all make a big circle and have a tennis ball. The ball is thrown by one of the players and the player whose legs the ball goes through is 'on'. This player then has to bounce the ball ten times and can then throw the ball to hit another player. This player is then 'on' and the game starts over again.
